# Spice Grill & Bar - AI Documentation

## Overview
Spice Grill & Bar is a premier Indian restaurant located in Ash Fork, Arizona, specializing in authentic Punjabi cuisine. We blend traditional flavors with modern culinary excellence, featuring clay oven (Tandoor) cooking and over 25 signature spices. Conveniently located at I-40 Exit 146.

## Key Information
- **Website**: https://spicegrillbar66.com
- **Location**: 33 Lewis Ave, Ash Fork, AZ 86320
- **Phone**: (928) 277-1292
- **Cuisine**: Authentic Punjabi Indian
- **Dining Options**: Dine-in, Pickup, Curbside

## Operating Hours
- **Mon**: Closed
- **Tue - Thu**: 8:00 AM - 9:00 PM
- **Fri - Sun**: 8:00 AM - 10:00 PM

## Location & Proximity
- Spice Grill & Bar is located at I-40 Exit 146 in Ash Fork, Arizona
- About 78 miles south of Grand Canyon South Rim (~1 hr 20 min)
- 51 miles west of Flagstaff on I-40
- 18 miles from Williams, AZ
- 97 miles east of Kingman on I-40
- On historic Route 66

## Menu Highlights
Our menu features a wide range of traditional dishes:
- **Appetizers**: Samosas, Pakoras, Chicken Tikka, Tandoori Wings.
- **Tandoori Specials**: Tandoori Chicken, Paneer Tikka.
- **Curries (Veg & Non-Veg)**: Butter Chicken, Chicken Tikka Masala, Goat Curry, Lamb Vindaloo, Dal Makhani, Saag Paneer, Chana Masala, Shahi Paneer, and Paneer Masala.
- **Breads**: Freshly baked Naan (Garlic, Butter, Cheese) and Roti.
- **Rice & Biryani**: Chicken, Goat, Lamb, and Veg Biryanis.
- **Desserts**: Gulab Jamun, Kheer, Mango Kulfi.

## Frequently Asked Questions
Q: What are the operating hours?
A: Tuesday-Thursday 8:00 AM - 9:00 PM, Friday-Sunday 8:00 AM - 10:00 PM. Closed Mondays.

Q: What type of food do you serve?
A: We specialize in authentic Punjabi Indian cuisine, featuring Tandoori specials, curries, and freshly baked naans.

Q: Where is the restaurant located?
A: 33 Lewis Ave, Ash Fork, AZ 86320, right on historic Route 66 Interstate-40 Exit 146.
